programme.title: American political underdogs
programme.short_synopsis: How will President Clinton's popularity be affected by the 1994 Congressional elections?
programme.medium_synopsis: How President Clinton's position will be affected by the upcoming congressional elections leads Cooke to recall the underdogs and upsets from the history of American politics.
